about_the_game:
We're very proud to partner with Todd Stashwick with the release of Boom Boom the Tavernkeep Familiar! The net proceeds of all Boom Boom sales for the first week of release will be donated to Extra Life.

Every wizard needs a familiar, right?

Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as leveling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using ultimates. Depending on the assigned task, a Familiar will click a certain number of times per second/minute.

In this pack:
Boom Boom the Tavernkeep Familiar
4 Epic Potions of Speed
4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance
1 Potion of Polish
